data.title: Microsoft employees sound alarm over new partnership with oil industry giants
data.text: Employees from a climate change advocacy group at Microsoft are sounding the alarm over the company’s new partnership with Chevron and Schlumberger, announced just days before the Global Climate Strike.

data.title: Microsoft Boosts Its Dividend -- What You Should Know
data.text: The software giant is getting more aggressive about returning capital to shareholders.

data.title: Microsoft edges up as it authorizes $40 billion of buybacks and raises dividend
data.text: Microsoft shares rose 1% after hours as it announced plans to raise its dividend and authorized as much as $40 billion to buy back shares.

data.title: Microsoft raises dividend by 11%, announces $40B buyback: Josh Lipton
data.text: CNBC's Josh Lipton joins "Closing Bell" with the latest news from Microsoft, which has announced a dividend increase, a $40 billion buyback program and a date for its next shareholder meeting.

data.title: Microsoft board hikes dividend 11%, OKs $40 billion in buybacks
data.text: Microsoft Corp. MSFT, +0.82% shares rose in the extended session Wednesday after the tech giant's board approved a dividend hike and billions in new share repurchases.

data.title: Microsoft approves $40 billion share repurchase program
data.text: Microsoft Corp  said on Wednesday its board had approved a new share repurchase program of up to $40 billion.

data.title: Fades After Strong Start; Solar Stocks Shine
data.text: The Nasdaq composite rose 0.7% early but ended near its session low. Still, the session yielded plenty of strong movers.

data.title: Microsoft-owned GitHub acquires code analysis startup Semmle to bolster security
data.text: GitHub has acquired Semmle, the San Francisco-based maker of a code analysis platform, to bump up security for the coding repository.

data.title: Look for Microsoft Stock to See a Big Post-Earnings Pop
data.text: Microsoft's rally paused in recent weeks, but the breather is likely to end. Once earnings are reported Microsoft stock should get a boost.
